meanings.definition: Of or relating to the zodiac.
meanings.sent1: The zodiacal symbols represent different star patterns.
meanings.sent2: She read her zodiacal forecast for the week.
meanings.sent3: The zodiacal signs decided to have a party in the night sky.
meanings.sent4: His zodiacal personality shone through in his actions.
meanings.sent5: The zodiacal constellations guided ancient sailors on their journeys.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of the zodiac.
meanings.sent1: Her dress had a zodiacal pattern of stars and moons.
meanings.sent2: The room was decorated with zodiacal symbols.
meanings.sent3: The zodiacal cupcakes were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: His zodiacal necklace was a unique piece of jewelry.
meanings.sent5: The zodiacal colors of blue and gold filled the room with warmth.

meanings.definition: Located within or determined by the zodiac.
meanings.sent1: The zodiacal constellations can be seen in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: Her zodiacal chart revealed interesting insights.
meanings.sent3: The zodiacal garden bloomed with celestial flowers.
meanings.sent4: His zodiacal fate seemed written in the stars.
meanings.sent5: The zodiacal calendar marked important celestial events.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the twelve astrological signs of the zodiac.
meanings.sent1: She studied the zodiacal signs to understand personalities.
meanings.sent2: His zodiacal birth chart revealed his strengths and weaknesses.
meanings.sent3: The zodiacal animals danced across the sky in a cosmic parade.
meanings.sent4: The zodiacal symbols were used to predict future events.
meanings.sent5: The zodiacal constellations held secrets of the universe within them.
